term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: Immediate Access to Medicare for the Disabled Act of 2003 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to waive the 24-month waiting period for Medicare (SSA title XVIII) coverage of certain disabled individuals who have no health insurance coverage.
